SELECT P.POST_CD "POST_CD", P.POST_DATE "POST_DATE", UI.USER_ID "USER_ID" , DECODE(PR.POST_REPT_CD, NULL, '공개', '비공개') "POST_CHECK" , P.OPINION , (DECODE(PR.POST_REPT_CD, NULL, '-', PR.POST_REPT_CD)) "POST_REPT_CD" , (DECODE(PR.POST_REPT_DATE, NULL, '-', PR.POST_REPT_DATE)) "POST_REPT_DATE" , (DECODE(UI2.USER_ID, NULL, '-', UI2.USER_ID)) "REPT_USER_ID" , (DECODE(APR.CNFM_CD, NULL, '-', 1, '승인')) "POST_CNFM" , (DECODE(APR.AD_CD, NULL, '-', APR.AD_CD)) "AD_ID" , (DECODE(APR.AD_POST_REPT_DATE, NULL, '-', APR.AD_POST_REPT_DATE)) "POST_CNFM_DATE" , (DECODE(FN_REPT_CATE(REPT_CATE_CD), NULL, '-', FN_REPT_CATE(REPT_CATE_CD))) "REPT_CATE_CD" , (DECODE(PRD.POST_REPT_DTL_CONT, NULL, '-', PRD.POST_REPT_DTL_CONT)) "POST_REPT_DETAIL" FROM POST P LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON P.USER_DSTN_CD = UI.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN POST_REPT PR ON P.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI2 ON PR.USER_DSTN_CD = UI2.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD LEFT JOIN POST_REPT_DTL PRD ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = PRD.POST_REPT_CD WHERE P.POST_CD=#{post_cd}

SELECT C.CMNT_CD, C.POST_CD, C.CMNT_DATE, UI.USER_ID , DECODE(CR.CMNT_REPT_CD, NULL, '공개', '비공개') "CMNT_CHECK" , C.CMNT_CONT , (DECODE(CR.CMNT_REPT_CD, NULL, '-', CR.CMNT_REPT_CD)) "CMNT_REPT_CD" , (DECODE(CR.CMNT_REPT_DATE, NULL, '-', CR.CMNT_REPT_DATE)) "CMNT_REPT_DATE" , (DECODE(UI2.USER_ID, NULL, '-', UI2.USER_ID)) "REPT_USER_ID" , (DECODE(ACR.CNFM_CD, NULL, '-', 1, '승인')) "CMNT_CNFM" , (DECODE(ACR.AD_CD, NULL, '-', ACR.AD_CD)) "AD_ID" , (DECODE(ACR.AD_CMNT_REPT_DATE, NULL, '-', ACR.AD_CMNT_REPT_DATE)) "CMNT_CNFM_DATE" , (DECODE(FN_REPT_CATE(REPT_CATE_CD), NULL, '-', FN_REPT_CATE(REPT_CATE_CD))) "REPT_CATE_CD" , (DECODE(CRD.CMNT_REPT_DTL_CONT, NULL, '-', CRD.CMNT_REPT_DTL_CONT)) "CMNT_REPT_DETAIL" FROM CMNT C LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON C.USER_DSTN_CD = UI.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN CMNT_REPT CR ON C.CMNT_CD = CR.CMNT_CD LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI2 ON CR.USER_DSTN_CD = UI2.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN AD_CMNT_REPT ACR ON CR.CMNT_REPT_CD = ACR.CMNT_REPT_CD LEFT JOIN CMNT_REPT_DTL CRD ON CR.CMNT_REPT_CD = CRD.CMNT_REPT_CD WHERE C.CMNT_CD=#{cmnt_cd}
